mapper.select: SELECT a.CommunityID, a.CommunityTitle,a.Content,b.Name,DATE_FORMAT(a.CreatedTime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FormattedDate, b.Position FROM announcement a INNER JOIN employees b ON a.AuthorEmployeeID = b.EmployeeID ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT a.emailid, c.name, c.email, a.subject, a.senderemployeeid, a.receiveremployeeid, a.sendtime FROM emails a INNER JOIN employees c ON a.SenderEmployeeID=c.EmployeeId WHERE (senderemployeeid=#{param1} AND tcsend=0 AND sendmark=1) OR (receiveremployeeid=#{param1} AND tcreceive=0 AND receivemark=1) ORDER BY a.emailid DESC LIMIT 0,5;

SELECT a.CommunityID, a.CommunityTitle,a.Content,b.Name,DATE_FORMAT(a.CreatedTime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FormattedDate, b.Position FROM communities a INNER JOIN employees b ON a.AuthorEmployeeID = b.EmployeeID ORDER BY CreatedTime DESC LIMIT 0,5
